Need Help?

Our Ask an Expert service gives you the opportunity to pick the brains of Tom Jewell, Managing Director of Source Property Investments.  If you have any questions about property investment in 2018 take advantage of our Ask an Expert Service.

Tom and his colleagues have already helped many investors maximise their property investments.  Their expertise and impartial advice is available to help you begin or continue a journey in buy to let property investment.

Strong Market and Opportunity

You may have been put off by recent Government disincentives in the buy to let market.  Such as the 3% stamp duty tax hike and the cut to mortgage tax relief being phased in over the next three years.  But there are still many excellent reasons for investing in the buy to let market.

Fundamentally the market remains strong. The number of UK households renting their homes has risen steadily over recent years (up from 2.3 million in 2001 to 5.4 million in 2014).  Less than 165,000 new homes were built in England in 2015.  It is forecast that 1.8million more households will be looking to rent rather than buy by 2025.

The combination of increased demand for rental property and the decrease in new landlords entering the market because of fears over the Government’s disincentives mean that now could be an excellent time for you to either start or continue building your property portfolio.

Ask an Expert

Typical questions maybe around how to find the best type of property and location.  How much capital is required. How to best leverage the capital you have available and how to maximise current investments etc.

Whatever questions you have our Ask an Expert service is completely free and without obligation.

To take advantage of the Ask an Expert service you can organise a call with Tom personally on 02072054060 or email questions through https://zentrohomes.com/contact-us/

Source Property Investments provides an end to end service from sourcing, financing, buying, letting and maintaining your property.
